title: Kabul offers talks with Taliban 'without preconditions'
text:
Kabul offers talks with Taliban 'without preconditions' 1:15pm GMT - 01:42 
Afghan President Ashraf Ghani offered recognition of the Taliban as a legitimate political group on Wednesday as part of a proposed political process that he said could lead to talks aimed at ending more than 16 years of war.   
Afghan President Ashraf Ghani offered recognition of the Taliban as a legitimate political group on Wednesday as part of a proposed political process that he said could lead to talks aimed at ending more than 16 years of war.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/28/kabul-offers-talks-with-taliban-without?videoId=404972574&videoChannel=13422
